front.title: FCFS SAVI: First-Come First-Serve Source-Address Validation for Locally Assigned IPv6 Addresses

abstract.t: This memo describes FCFS SAVI a mechanism to provide source address validation for IPv6 networks using the First-Come First-Serve principle. The proposed mechanism is intended to complement ingress filtering techniques to provide a finer granularity on the control of the source addresses used.
